nodes.text: Dynamic Synergetics Incorporated, also known under the abbreviated name Dyn Synerge, was a subsidiary of the InterGalactic Banking Clan, one of the galaxy's most important commerce guilds. The corporation went bankrupt during the Clone Wars.

Dynamic Synergetics Incorporated first appeared under the name Dynamic Synergetics, Inc. in Planet of the Mists, a 1992 Star Wars Legends adventure supplement written by Nigel D. Findley for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was established to be canon when it was mentioned on a data-screen in "An Old Friend," the fifth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season, under the abbreviated name Dyn Synerge. The company's full name was revealed by "An Old Friend"'s accompanying episode guide on StarWars.com.
